short_summary: Phire or equivalent for Public Services and Procurement Canada
description: Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to view and access solicitations from SSC, submit a response to a solicitation, receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations, be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments, and submit invoices and receive payment status updates.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title and Solicitation Number
- **Agency Responsible:** Public Services and Procurement Canada
- **Reference Number:** SSC-23-00021575:T
- **Solicitation Number:** BPM017986/21575
- **Publication Date:** 25 January 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** 15 February 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
- **Tender Status:** Expired

## Contract Details
- **Contract Category:** Goods and Services (G&SG)
- **Goods and Services Identifier (GSIN):** N7030 (ADP Software)
- **United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC):** None
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
- **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

## End User Entities
- **End User Entities Name:** Shared Services Canada
- **End User Entities Address:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0B6, Canada

## Contact Information
- **Contact Name:** Chantal Deland
- **Contact Email:** [chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
- **Contact Phone Number:** (343) 551-7304

## Tender Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada invites bidders to bid on a contract for Phire or equivalent software. Interested parties can register on the Shared Services Canada (SSC) Procurement Portal to access the solicitation and submit a proposal. The contact information provided is for the Shared Services Canada Procurement Team.

Note: Since the contractor's source text is an unordered list, I had to apply some format changes to make it easier to read. If needed, I can format the text exactly like the original.
